column4: I have had more HELL trying to install Kubuntu from CD than Ubuntu. The installer is borked.
so maybe there is less attention from dev for kubuntu?
That's my concern, yes. I've seen differences in it, on every time I installed, since 6.10 to 7.4 and now 7.10
i was wondering to install kubuntu on my girlfriends pc, since she like all that shines.. but maybe choose ubuntu instead..
